name: places/ChIJm2j1t6VZwokRQumWL031RsA
formattedAddress: 18 W 8th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 18 W 8th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Go to 305!!!! That is all I can really say. If you are hesitating, just try it - it is one of the most fun, unique, energizing, and SAFE workout classes I’ve been to.

The instructors are so positive and welcoming, and never criticize for needing breaks or modifications. You feel empowered and energized by the end, and the environment is just cool - the live DJ, cool lights, and gorgeous design really adds to the experience. I was living in NYC temporarily and this was a place I consistently felt excited and safe to visit, even as a “non-local.” Thank you 305, I’ll miss you!

originalText.text:
6+ years with 305. The energy, the movements (afro, latin), the DJs, the lighting, and the encouraging trainers. So incredibly friendly and welcoming to newcomers and an overall powerful feminine energy. BIPOC and LGBTQ+ friendly.

Kyra and Raella are the all time best instructors! I took so much inspo from them and hung onto their every word at the end of class on setting positive intentions, self love, all of the goodies. Beautiful representation of strong, real women.

I'm sad to have recently moved away from NYC but still workout to their awesome online videos. @Sadie - A huge thank you. Come to Denver!

originalText.text:
Extremely frustrating that you can come and the door is locked bc the front desk wants to take the class instead of doing their job. And it’s been dangerously cold outside. Not ok and extremely irresponsible/inconsiderate.

Update: The second photo is 4 days later on Tuesday morning. Here we are at 7:15am waiting for the 7am instructor to arrive in the cold.

I'll be contacting them via email today.

originalText.text: I was in NY for work and decided to do a class for fun and a workout while traveling. The studio is so cute, staff is super friendly and welcoming. I took class with Amit. She was F.I.R.E. so inspiring, great choreography, sexy and fun moves...incredible live DJ too!!! I didn't want the class to end....but I was also so exhausted and sweated off so many calories!!! I will be making this a staple spot every time I come to NYC!!! Thank you 305 fitness for creating such an amazing place to dance and feel supported all!!!

originalText.text: Honestly one of the best dance classes I’ve ever taken! It was such a welcoming and positive environment and I can’t wait to go back. Alicia was absolutely amazing! Her energy is unmatched. If you’ve been wanting to take a fun, inviting and nonjudgmental dance class where you can just let loose and be yourself this is the one for you.
